pageTitle: Vietnam Tour of Duty Photographs from Kevin Brooks
pageIntro:
A collection of photographs from Kevin Brooks (Charlie Company, 1st Battalion / 3rd Marines) taken during his tour of duty in the Vietnam War.

Photographs © 2019 Kevin Brooks; published with permission as compliments to The Cage, an in-progress book project.
